scripts.audit: (npm run key-add || true) && (npm i --ignore-scripts || npm run clean && npm i --ignore-scripts) && npm audit --audit-level=high && exit $?
scripts.build: npm run audit && npm run key-remove && tsc
scripts.clean-build: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.copy-yaml: rm -rf dist/server/app/v1/documentation && mkdir dist/server/app/v1/documentation && cp src/server/app/v1/documentation/* dist/server/app/v1/documentation/
scripts.deploy: npm run key-add && gcloud app deploy app.yaml --project={GCPNAMEPROJECT} --version={VERSIONTODEPLOY} && npm run key-remove
scripts.eslint: npm run git-hook && npm run enable-eslint && npm run compile-eslint
scripts.key-add: local_key=`(grep -shE 'key=(.*)' ./emergya.properties ../emergya.properties ../../emergya.properties | head -1 2> /dev/null || echo"") | sed -E 's#key=(.*)#\1#'` && [ ! -z "$local_key" ] && (sed -i.bk -E "s#https:\/\/virtual-assisant-product\.ew\.r\.appspot\.com\/(.*)\/(.+)\.tgz(.)(\,){0,1}\$#https:\/\/virtual-assisant-product\.ew\.r\.appspot\.com\/\1\/\2.tgz?key="$local_key"\3\4#g" package.json) && rm package.json.bk || echo "No key found"
scripts.lint-local: path=`pwd | rev | cut -d'/' -f 1,2 | rev` && cd ../../ && npm run lint-local --libtolint=$path/src/**/*
scripts.preinstall: echo "\x1b[32m[Emergya Preinstall Clear Cache NPM]" && npm cache clean --force
scripts.test: npm ls --depth=0 || npm run build && jest --useStderr --forceExit
scripts.test-cloud-build: npm run clean && npm run audit && tsc && npm run key-remove
